title: Liebestod
text:
"" ( German for "love death") is the title of the final, dramatic music from the 1859 <a href="opera">opera</a> "" by <a href="Richard%20Wagner">Richard Wagner</a>. It is the <a href="Climax%20%28narrative%29">climactic</a> end of the opera, as Isolde sings over Tristan's dead body.
The music is often used in film and television productions of doomed lovers.
